facts.text: I might be the most colorful fish in the ocean! My swirling blue, orange, and green patterns are one of a kind.
My blue color is super special! Instead of using pigments, my skin has tiny structures that create blue light.
I have stinky, slimy skin! My mucus smells bad and tastes terrible, which keeps predators away.
I'm really shy! During the day I hide in coral rubble and only come out at sunset to find food and friends.
We do a beautiful dance at sunset! Male and female mandarins swim up together in a spiral when it's time to have babies.

profile.habitat: Coral reefs in the Western Pacific Ocean
